DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study measure effectiveness social marketing-based medical education intervention student use evidence-based template document outpatient asthma care within electronic medical record .
DOC.brief_title: Study Medical Student Use Templates Document Outpatient Asthma Care Electronic Medical Record
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study measure effectiveness physician-educator lead clinical documentation workshop , embed 7 persuasive social-marketing base message , medical student response use target asthma template . Stated differently , whether physician-educator could `` persuade '' medical student use evidence-based EMR asthma template document outpatient mild persistent asthma encounter patient .
DOC.criteria: Third year medical student complete family medicine clerkship Uniformed Services University All student list
